markdown:
Pugnacious and powerfully muscled, naunets serve as scouts and rank-and-file troops of protean armies. Resembling a thick salamander with a wide head, a powerful tail, and tentacles tipped with snapping jaws in place of rear legs, naunets are the most bestial of the proteans and occupy one of their lowest castes. Naunets are 12 feet long and weigh 900 pounds. All proteans are prone to unpredictable fits and unexpected action, but compared to most others, naunets are much more bestial. Always ready for a fight, naunets pride themselves in acting swiftly and striking before unpleasant distractions like diplomacy can blunt a combat’s beginning. **[Recall Knowledge - Monitor](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 23 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18 [Naunet](/Monsters.aspx?ID=337) **Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 267 **Perception** +14; entropy sense (imprecise) 30 feet, darkvision **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Protean](/Languages.aspx?ID=33) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +14, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +16, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +14, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12 **Str** +5 **Dex** +3 **Con** +5 **Int** +0 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +3 **Entropy Sense** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [prediction](/Traits.aspx?ID=132)) A naunet can anticipate the most likely presence of a creature through a supernatural insight into chaotic probabilities and chance. This grants it the ability to sense creatures within the listed range. A creature under the effects of [_nondetection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=209) or that is otherwise shielded from divinations and predictions cannot be noticed via entropy sense. --- **AC** 24 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +14 **Will** +12 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 120 ([fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15) 2) **Resistances** precision 5, protean anatomy 10 **Weaknesses** lawful 5 **Protean Anatomy** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) A naunet’s vital organs shift and change shape and position constantly. Immediately after the naunet takes acid, electricity, or sonic damage, it gains the listed amount of resistance to that damage type. This lasts for 1 hour or until the next time the protean takes damage of one of the other types (in which case its resistance changes to match that type), whichever comes first.
The naunet is immune to polymorph effects unless it is a willing target. If blinded or deafened, the naunet automatically recovers at the end of its next turn as new sensory organs grow to replace the compromised ones. --- **Speed** 25 feet, fly 30 feet, swim 25 feet; [_freedom of movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) **Melee** jaws +18 ([Chaotic](/Traits.aspx?ID=25), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d10+8 piercing plus 1d6 chaotic **Melee** tail +18 ([Chaotic](/Traits.aspx?ID=25), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+8 bludgeoning plus 1d6 chaotic and Grab **Melee** tentacle +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Chaotic](/Traits.aspx?ID=25), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+6 piercing plus 1d6 chaotic and confounding slam **Divine Innate Spells** DC 26, attack +16 - **1st** [Detect Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=65) (at will; lawful only) - **2nd** [Obscuring Mist](/Spells.aspx?ID=210) (at will) - **3rd** [Shatter](/Spells.aspx?ID=279) (at will) - **4th** [Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Solid Fog](/Spells.aspx?ID=290) - **5th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) - **Constant (4th)** [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) **Adaptive Strike** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The naunet chooses adamantine, cold iron, or silver; its melee Strikes count as that type for 1 minute or until it uses Adaptive Strike again. **[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The naunet can take the appearance of any Small, Medium, or Large animal, beast, or humanoid. This doesn’t change its Speed or its attack and damage bonuses with its Strikes but might change the damage type its Strikes deal. **Confounding Slam** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) A creature hit by the naunet’s tentacle Strike is [stupefied 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1d4 rounds (DC 24 Will negates). If the creature was already stupefied in this way, the duration extends by 1 round instead. A chaotic creature is only [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) instead. **[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** 1d8+8 bludgeoning, DC 26
name: Naunet
